document_data.name: Juhni
document_data.mainbody: hni had light skin and long white hair.
document_data.Description: Juhni had light skin and long white hair.
document_data.Personality: Under the influence of [[Halsaime's staff]], Juhni was utterly devoted to his mad cause, though she was still quite a bit less bloodthirsty and aggressive than her fellow victims.
document_data.Abilities: Juhni specialized in transforming into a huge [[dire bear]], eschewing other forms of combat.
